---
title: "Edit model inventory fields"
date: last-modified
---

Edit individual model detailed fields in the model inventory to customize them to your needs or to ensure that model details are accurate and up to date. 

## Prerequisites

- The model is already registered in the model inventory^1^.
- You are the model owner for the specific model you would like edit the details of, or an administrator^2^.

::: {.column-margin}
**Learn more:**

^1^ [Register models in the inventory](register-models-in-inventory.qmd)

^2^ [Users (Supported roles)](/guide/configuration/onboarding-users.qmd#supported-roles)

|   [Manage users (User roles)](/guide/configuration/manage-users.qmd#user-roles)
:::

## Steps

<!--- NR TO DO Check with Mehdi: these steps didn't work for me, can't edit. Wrong permissions maybe? --->

1. Log in to the {{< var vm_login >}}.

2. On the **Model Inventory** page, select a model to view the model details.

3. Use the **Edit** buttons to edit specific fields on the model details page: 

   a. Make the **Edit** button appear by hovering over a data field you would like to edit.
   b. Click the **Edit** button to modify entries in each field.

4. Click **Done** to save your edits.

::: {.column-margin}
::: {.callout-important}
The following fields cannot be edited:

- ID
- Model Validators
:::
:::
